original_text: therefore this is what the Lord Almighty says: “I will punish them. Their young men will die by the sword, their sons and daughters by famine.
korean_text: 그러므로 만군의 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시니라 보라 내가 그들을 벌하리니 청년들은 칼에 죽으며 자녀들은 기근에 죽고

sentences.original_text: therefore this is what the Lord Almighty says
Their young men will die by the sword
their sons and daughters by famine
